channel.title: Mercer County Office of Emergency Management/ Floodplain Development | Princeton WV | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/mercercountywvoem/

item.title: Hot conditions will continue throughout the day today. Slig
item.description: Hot conditions will continue throughout the day today. Slight cool down may be in store for the weekend.

item.title: Conditions will be mainly dry through the middle of the work
item.description: Conditions will be mainly dry through the middle of the work week, though temperatures and humidity will increase each day, and above normal temperatures are expected for much of the week. Heat indices between 95 to 100 degrees are possible for Wednesday afternoon.

item.title: With School back in session please watch out for area childr
item.description: With School back in session please watch out for area children as they are at local bus stops and getting on and off the school bus. The school bus stop sign means just that STOP. Help keep our kids safe.
